Everard Auctions & Appraisals

★★★★★ 4.6/5 (1 reviews)

About Everard Auctions & Appraisals

Everard Auctions & Appraisals provides professional art appraisal services in Savannah. With expertise in Southern estate collections, fine/decorative arts (18th–20th century), silverware, they offer reliable valuations for insurance, estate planning, and donations.

Specialties

Southern estate collectionsfine/decorative arts (18th–20th century)silverware

Services

  • online auctions
  • gallery appraisals
  • estate appraisals

Pricing

Auction-based fees; consignment rates vary

Certifications

  • USPAP-compliant
